spec_data.Name: perl-Getopt-ArgvFile
spec_data.Description:
This module simply interpolates option file hints in @ARGV by the contents
of the pointed files. This enables option reading from files instead of or
additional to the usual reading from the command line.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:55:14 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Interpolates script options from files into @ARGV or another array
